org.openadaptor.auxil.connector.smtp
Class SMTPWriteConnector

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component
      org.openadaptor.core.connector.AbstractWriteConnector
          org.openadaptor.auxil.connector.smtp.SMTPWriteConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
Administrable, IComponent, IWriteConnector
public class SMTPWriteConnector
extends AbstractWriteConnector

This Write Connector will deliver data by sending it as an email using the SMTP protocol. It needs to be configured with an SMTPConnection.

Author:
Kuldip Ottal

setSmtpConnection

public void setSmtpConnection(SMTPConnection smtpConnection)

deliver

public java.lang.Object deliver(java.lang.Object[] data)
                         throws OAException
Creates and sends email containing the data. The body of the message is a concatentation of calls to Component.toString() on each element in the data array.

Parameters:
data - an array of objects to be processed.
Returns:
result string confirming that the email was sucessfully sent.
Throws:
OAException

connect

public void connect()
creates smtp connection

disconnect

public void disconnect()
disposes of smtp connection
